title: Tense situation near Police HQ
body_lines: A tense situation arose near the Police Head Quarters (HQ) yesterday with the Socialist Youth Union (SYU) demanding response for not taking the attackers into custody who were involved in the recent GotGoGama attack. The union members held a protest march from the Fort Railway Station to the Police Head Quarters, Colombo. Pix by Pradeep Dilrukshana
